Application Gallery

Find inspiration in these examples of creative uses of Europeana content. Discover a range of applications of the Europeana API, the semantic web and Linked Open Data technologies.

Filter by:

Contribute to the Gallery
Help Improve This Content

  • Biblioteca Digital Hispánica

    The National Library of Spain has implemented the Europeana API in their online portal, Biblioteca Digital Hispánica. The portal now enables their users to access related Europeana content via single link on their search result header.

    API Hackathon CaseStudy

  • ATHENA

    ATHENA is a project developing metadata exchange standards for the museum domain and aggregating museum content for Europeana. Through our API, they have built a search service where users can perform keyword searches and structured searches to find and view Europeana items.

    Example: search for the famous photographer, Man Ray

    API Hackathon CaseStudy
